plot: In order to get out to a poker game, Errol tells his wife he has some business with a Chinese merchant, who turns out to be a counterfeiter, and mistakes Errol for one of his connections.
title: Chinatown Chump
plot_es: In order to get out to a poker game, Errol tells his wife he has some business with a Chinese merchant, who turns out to be a counterfeiter, and mistakes Errol for one of his connections.
plot_en: In order to get out to a poker game, Errol tells his wife he has some business with a Chinese merchant, who turns out to be a counterfeiter, and mistakes Errol for one of his connections.
